title: Not Just Fate
description: ‘Not Just Fate’, Shilpa’s thriller packed and fast paced debut novel, takes us through the tensions and dilemmas of average urban Indian youths in the contemporary scenario of work, relationship and aspirations. Story takes a twirl when a young criminal crosses path with these youngsters and devastates them. Although it is a tale of revenge, romance and remorse, the extraordinary acts put together by these youngsters, leave everything behind…
author: Shilpa Arora Sharma
